  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientController
    Class to receive and validate the information from the client for the invoice The class sets iu elements and events to receive the name, nit or email from the client if he or she wants to provide them the class uses regular expressions to verify each field
    ComboController
    This class contains the necessary methods to run the stage of combos menu.
    ExtraProductsController
    This class is used to be able to manage the data, methods, buttons and combo boxes used in the execution screen of the secondary products' menu.
    HomeOrderController
    HomeOrder Controller for the user orders management from the different stages It is the controller for the main screen application
    IngredientController
    This class is in charge of modifying the elements of the ingredient information box view The class gets the attributes of the pizzaIngredient to create an observable information box to show on screen
    InvoiceController
    This class is the controller for the invoice printing
    ModifyOrdersController
    This class is the controller to manage modify orders
    OrderController
    This class is used to a le to handle the buttons , view tablets where the order can be visualized.
    PizzaController
    This class is in charge of modifying the elements of the pizza information box view The class gets the attributes of the pizzaModel to create an observable information box to show on screen
    PizzaCreationController
    This class modifies the ui elements of the PizzaCreationView to manage the creation of a pizza the class has methods to modify or instance javafx components in order of the client or user can create his o her own pizza
    PizzasMenuController
    Menu Controller for the menu pizzas menu management
    SplashScreenController
    This class is in charge of controlling the display of the splash screen.
